thread.section_title: Blinds 2go Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Blinds 2go | www.blinds-2go.co.uk | 46 of 2268
thread.title: Matt D

author: Matt D
title: Matt D
text:
After moving into a new house we needed to find a bathroom blind that would be waterproof due to being situated next to the shower. Blinds 2go had a great selection of PVC blinds including patterns that many other places didn't have. It was also very useful to get a sample supplied to check colours and material before ordering.
The website was very easy to use and ensured the correct size blind was ordered. Being made to measure did mean the blind was quite pricey but once delivered Fitting was very easy unlike when I have previously had to trim down roller blinds.
